problem.markdown:
Approximetly, how many types of cetaceans exist? Enter the number.
= 90
[explanation] There are approximately 90 recognized species of cetaceans, which are marine mammals belonging to the order Cetacea. Cetaceans include whales, dolphins, and porpoises. [explanation]

numericalresponse.p: Approximetly, how many types of cetaceans exist? Enter the number.

div.p: There are approximately 90 recognized species of cetaceans, which are marine mammals belonging to the order Cetacea. Cetaceans include whales, dolphins, and porpoises.
